title: The Scent of Magic
description: Trapped. Sold. Hated.You’d think that being a magical Princess would be a perfect life, right?Wrong.The second-born daughter of the witch Queen, my mother treats me like a possession. A pet.And then I’m sold to her enemies.The shifters hate us, and now I’m trapped in their den. I’m in danger no matter where I turn.And when I meet my three captors, it’s not just my life at risk. It’s my heart.One wants me. One hates me. One hates to want me.But I’m no delicate flower, and they’re about to find out how far I’ll go to survive. Especially when the threats just keep on coming.The Scent of Magic is a full-length paranormal romance. It is a reverse harem novel, meaning the main character has more than one love interest, and contains steamy, adult scenes and language. It is book one in the Emerald Wood Pack series.
author: Samantha   Jayne
